DOC.detailed_description: This phase 1 clinical study ( AT148001 ) open-label , multi-center , multiple-dose , dose-escalation , safety , PK , PD study ALX148 . The phase 1 protocol 2 part : single agent dose escalation phase ( Part 1 ) combination therapy phase ( Part 2 ) . Part 2 include initial dose escalation portion follow dose expansion portion . Approximately 110 adult patient expect enrolled study .
